orc.name: Orc
orc.description: Large, muscular humanoids with prominent tusks, horns, and greenish to blue-tinged skin. Known for physical prowess and a direct approach to problem-solving. Orcs value strength and honour.

goblin.name: Goblin
goblin.description: Tall, gangly, and nimble creatures with sharp features and clever minds. Masters of quick thinking and quicker movement. Often underestimated due to their size.

gnome.name: Gnome
gnome.description: Diminutive folk with an innate connection to magic and mechanical innovation. Their small stature belies their vast knowledge and magical aptitude.

dwarf.name: Dwarf
dwarf.description: Stocky, bearded people are renowned for their craftsmanship and resilience. Dwarves endure hardships that would break others and create works of lasting beauty.

fairy.name: Fairy
fairy.description: Ethereal beings are closely tied to nature and magic. Delicate in appearance but possessing powerful magical abilities and profound woodland wisdom.

human.name: Human
human.description: Adaptable and diverse people who once shared closer ties with cosmic forces. Humans show remarkable variation and potential across all areas.

elf.name: Elf
elf.description: Graceful, long-lived people with pointed ears and an affinity for magic. Their extended lifespans grant them deep knowledge and magical insight.

giant.name: Giant
giant.description: Towering humanoids of immense size and strength. Their great stature makes them formidable but less agile than smaller folk. These giants tend to spend most of their time with fairies or other cosmic folk to avoid the anger of humans.

cosmikin.name: Cosmikin
cosmikin.description: Otherworldly beings bearing traits of both angelic and demonic heritage. Their cosmic nature makes them powerful magic users but unstable in earthly realms.
